alert.note: Alert for Ketchikan Gateway Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 28 at 11:50AM AKST until January 29 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Ward Lake near Areas Near The Ward Lake Recreational Area. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1147 AM AKST, the dam operator reported heavy rain in areas near the Ward Lake recreational area. Minor flooding is ongoing, especially near Ward Lake. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1.5 to 2.5 inches are possible. - Rain has come to an end across the Ketchikan area this morning although more rain is expected to move into the area starting this afternoon. Moderate rain is currently being reported across the Haida Gwaii.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
